patthana8.7:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana8.7:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for reason.
patthana8.7:2.1_0: (This is the same way as the previous discourse.)
patthana8.7:3.1_0: Rebirth is a cause and reason for this.
patthana8.7:5.1_0: for the sake of a single basis, two offenses,
patthana8.7:5.1_1: lack of due respect for two,
